name: deepliif-compute-scores
label: DeepLIIF - extract scores from IHC prediction
description: This package calculates IHC scores derived from the DeepLIIF algorithm.
author: D3b-TIRU

refined-segmentation.description: Refined segmentation file output by deepliif-predict

seg_thresh.description: The (probability) threshold used to classify the pixels in the final segmentation (Default = 150).

size_thresh.description: Lower size threshold in pixels. Only include cells larger than this count (Default = auto).

size_thresh_upper.description: Upper size threshold in pixels, or None. Only include cells smaller than this count (Default = None).

marker_thresh.description: Marker threshold, if 'auto' determines based on distribution of values in marker image (default: auto).

resolution.description: Magnification level to use if size_thresh=auto (default: None = 40x, allowed values = '20x' or '10x').
